item.description:
Remember last time we were here ?    hard to forget.......great food......super service....and so many laughs......Paula mentioned me wearing pink silk pajamas...remember? who will be wearing them?...your host or someone else?......come and find out!!!!! I will go out on a limb and guarantee a night of laughs !!!

the menu features made from scratch dishes,including certified Angus beef,bison,chicken and seafood. American dishes include steaks,meatloaf,crab cakes,trout,salmon, and other delicious foods......come and enjoy!prices are reasonable.....

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: IT'S BACK ! TED'S MONTANA GRILL SEPT 24 7pm
